name: rikueco-analytics-functions
description: Google Cloud Functions for Rikueco Job Navi Analytics

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy getAnalyticsData --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1
scripts.deploy:sendEmail: gcloud functions deploy sendEmail --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --set-env-vars SENDGRID_API_KEY=$SENDGRID_API_KEY
scripts.deploy:inboundParse: gcloud functions deploy inboundParse --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1
scripts.deploy:getEmails: gcloud functions deploy getEmails --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1
scripts.deploy:calendar: gcloud functions deploy initiateCalendarAuth --no-gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --set-env-vars GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID=$GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID,GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET=$GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET && gcloud functions deploy calendarOAuthCallback --no-gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --set-env-vars GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID=$GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID,GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET=$GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET && gcloud functions deploy getCalendarAvailability --no-gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --set-env-vars GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID=$GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID,GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET=$GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET && gcloud functions deploy createCalendarEvent --no-gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --set-env-vars GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID=$GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID,GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET=$GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET && gcloud functions deploy getCalendarIntegration --no-gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 && gcloud functions deploy revokeCalendarAuth --no-gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1
scripts.deploy:createCompanyUser: gcloud functions deploy createCompanyUser --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1
scripts.deploy:deleteCompanyUser: gcloud functions deploy deleteCompanyUser --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1
scripts.deploy:migrateCompanyUsers: gcloud functions deploy migrateCompanyUsersToFirebaseAuth --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1
scripts.deploy:legacyLogin: gcloud functions deploy legacyLogin --no-gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --project generated-area-484613-e3
scripts.deploy:auth: npm run deploy:createCompanyUser && npm run deploy:deleteCompanyUser && npm run deploy:migrateCompanyUsers && npm run deploy:legacyLogin
